name: Keepitsimple
body:
### Welcome to Keepitsimple
This task management tool is the easiest way to manage your todo lists for all of your projects.
Responsive and ergonomic, one screen is enough to handle task creation, modification, deletion. Tasks can have different status (red, orange, green, gray and yellow), can be ordered, and are searchable.

### Technologies
keepitsimple is an AJAX-ed application developed on top of JQuery and bootstrap.

### More than words, try it !
A demo will soon be available.

### Bug tracker
Have a bug? Please create an issue here on GitHub!

https://github.com/gdromard/keepitsimple/issues

### Authors
Follow me on github @gdromard.
This is the version 2 of a self tool that I used to play with on my professional every day life.
